backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, check-ins, invite codes, and access‑controlled actions for managing RSVPs, pairing, and profile data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and related test cases.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across authentication, profile setup, pairing, check-ins, and dashboard features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling auth flow, profile setup, pairing, relationship status gating, and switching between main views.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper showing flags and relationship‑colored heart when paired, plus header, footer, auth button, and content slot.
frontend/src/features/checkins/CheckInCo: UI component for composing and submitting a daily check‑in with emoji and message, handling premium limits and success states.
frontend/src/features/checkins/constants: Defines available mood emojis and the maximum message length for check‑ins.
frontend/src/features/checkins/TodayStat: Displays today's check‑ins for the user and partner, showing status, latest entries, and loading states.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useCheckI: React Query hook that fetches historical check‑ins from the backend with a configurable limit.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useSubmit: Mutation hook for submitting a check‑in and invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useTodayC: React Query hook that loads today's check‑ins for the authenticated user.
Builds and exports a deduplicated, alphabetized ISO country list and lookup helper.
frontend/src/features/country/CountriesM: Popover-based searchable country selector using the ISO country list.
Converts a two‑letter ISO country code into its flag emoji using regional indicator symbols.
frontend/src/features/country/iso3166Alp: Exports the full ISO 3166‑1 alpha‑2 dataset of country codes and names.
frontend/src/features/country/worldMapPa: Empty placeholder file for world map path data.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/CheckInH: Renders a list of recent check‑ins with dates, authorship labels, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Renders the main dashboard with relationship status, streak section, and tabs for today’s check-in and history.
frontend/src/features/emotionalmap/Emoti: Displays both partners’ latest emotional check-ins with loading, pairing checks, and an emotional comparison message.
frontend/src/features/pairing/PairingCar: Provides UI for generating an invite code and joining a partner using a token, with copy and loading states.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useDisconn: Mutation hook to disconnect from a partner and invalidate related pairing and profile queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useInviteT: Generates an invite token through the actor and exposes token state, loading, and error handling.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useJoinWit: Mutation hook to join with an invite token and refresh partner-related queries on success.
frontend/src/features/pairing/usePairing: Fetches partnered principal and profile data and returns pairing status, names, and loading state.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Dialog for creating or completing a user profile with name and country selection, including validation and save handling.
frontend/src/features/profile/useGetCall: Loads the current user profile via actor and exposes loading and fetch status.
frontend/src/features/profile/useHasPrem: Queries whether the current user has premium status using the actor.
frontend/src/features/profile/useSaveCal: Saves the caller’s profile with validation and invalidates the profile query on success.
frontend/src/features/relationshipStatus: UI for selecting and saving a relationship status with loading feedback and completion callback.
Maps relationship statuses to Tailwind color classes and provides a helper to retrieve colors.
Fetches current relationship status and user profile, exposing flags for chooser status and loading state.
Provides a mutation to set the relationship status with permission checks and query invalidation.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsV: Renders settings UI for managing country selection and partner disconnection with related mutations and dialogs.
frontend/src/features/streak/StreakSecti: Displays the shared streak count with animation when updated, hiding content if unpaired or loading.
frontend/src/features/streak/useSharedSt: Queries the actor for the shared streak value, converting it to a number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that queries are organized in feature directories.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/checkInHelpers.ts: Helper to get the latest check-in by a specific author from a list.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, container queries, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current app features, architecture notes, known issues, and versioned state for a relationship app using Firebase.
